details:
verb
- make chemically neutral
= example: make chemically neutral
- make ineffective by counterbalancing the effect of
= example: make ineffective by counterbalancing the effect of
= synonyms: nullify, negate
- make incapable of military action
- get rid of (someone who may be a threat) by killing
= synonyms: waste
- make politically neutral and thus inoffensive
= example: make politically neutral and thus inoffensive
- oppose and mitigate the effects of by contrary actions
= synonyms: counterbalance
